head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DORFF, HELENA J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DORFF, HELENA J.

block.p: DORFF-Helena J. on June 29, 2000. Beloved wife of the late John Joseph Dorff. Loving mother of John J. Dorff Jr., and Sharon Conway. Caring sister of Ralph LaFountain and Patricia Frary. Dear grandmother of five, great grandmother of two. Funeral Wednesday 10 AM, Edwards-Dowdle Funeral Home, 64 Ashford Ave. (exit 17 Saw Mill), Dobbs Ferry, NY. Visiting from 9:00 AM. Memorials to Calvary Hospital appreciated.
